sub_title: Project Director at Schiphol Area Development Company (SADC) N.V.
summary:
Pieter is an expert in Airport City / Aerotropolis and real estate (RE) development, in generating non aviation revenues and in sustainable - circulair development. Pieter is managing director of the Airport City Academy, an Airport City educational  and consultancy firm. Besides that he is also project director at Schiphol Area Development Company (SADC).

Before he was the Chief Commercial and Development Officer of IKIA Airport City and worked for Schiphol Real Estate, a 100% subsidiary of the Schiphol Group. At Amsterdam Airport Schiphol he was responsible for the development and planning of the landside part of the airport and Airportcity, which includes a.o. the central area (Schiphol CBD) and the commercial buildings in this area. 

Furthermore he has experience in Real Estate and Area development, Airport Real Estate, non aviation revenues, strategic and conceptual development, new business development, economic development, sustainable and circular development, feasibility analysis, urban economics, financial management, general management, public speaking, commerce, SMART technologies, innovation, project directing (several large scale projects), (airport) master planning and program management. 

Some related projects at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol have been the area development of Schiphol CBD, the area development of Schiphol Oost Aerospace Exchange (the MRO area), the development of the new General Aviation Terminal, a high speed public transportation station (with historic W.W. II canopy) and several airport related offices and hotels.

In the past he was a.o. CEO of a construction / development company, commercial director, financial advisor on several infrastructural projects and project manager of several construction projects.

Pieter is a guest lecturer for a.o. ACI, SMART AIRPORTS, GTI and UBM-Kasarda on courses about non-aviation revenues and speaks regularly on conferences about Airport City and Aerotropolis development, Real Estate and (regional) economic development.

Pieter completed a Master of Science in Business and Urban Economics, a Postdoc in Financial Management and a Master in Real Estate with honors (cum laude).

awards.title: Most innovative building in The Netherlands ARC 2015
awards.description: Won the award for most innovative building in The Netherlands 2015 for the development of an innovative high speed bus terminal and the re use of a WWII hangar as canopy at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol. The hangar is also energy positive and has dynamic lighting.

profile_positions.description: Schiphol Area Development Company (SADC) develops and manages a growing and varied range of business locations along the Airport Corridor in the Amsterdam Metropolitan Area.
profile_positions.title: Project Director Airport area development

profile_positions.description: Airport City Academy is an intensive, two-day course that equips decision makers with the tools they need to develop successful airport real estate projects. The integrated course curriculum combines rigorous in-class training modules with site visits to airport city developments.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director and co-Founder

Managing Director of AIREA, Airportcity Development.
AIREA is a consulting and development company of high traffic locations (airport and other transit oriented areas).
